Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~sykesm I tried to recreate this a few times but couldn't. It seems good to add a "check for nil" regardless but also would like to know what causes the nil message in the first place. Can you attach logs next time you see it (will keep retrying too) ?

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: I haven't seen this in a very long time so I don't believe this is an issue any longer.
